about.title: About me
about.description: I am a full-stack developer who enjoys building websites and applications. I focus on both the front-end and back-end, which means I can create the part users see and the server-side logic that powers the application. I like solving problems and working with others to create useful software. I am always looking to learn new skills and improve my work.
about.fullStackDeveloper: I create websites and applications that are easy to use and work well on different devices.
about.goal: I enjoy learning about the latest technologies in web development. My goal is to make software that meets users needs and is easy to understand. I believe good communication and teamwork are important for success in any project.

resume.title: Resume
resume.name: Ostapuk Oleksandr
resume.objective: I am a full-stack developer with expertise in both front-end and back-end technologies. I enjoy creating functional and user-friendly web applications. Below is a brief overview of my experience and education.
resume.experience: Full-stack developer with experience building responsive web applications using modern frameworks and technologies. Focused on creating seamless user experiences and scalable back-end solutions.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering
education.institution: Lutsk National Technical University, Lutsk, Ukraine
education.details: Learned core concepts in software development, including web technologies, databases, and system architecture. Completed projects that focused on full-stack application development.

skills.title: Skills
skills.webDevelopment: I have experience in both front-end and back-end development. Below are some of the key skills I use:
